docs.title: Universal Sub Commands

docs.text: Ban Info This command can be used to ban users from the server with a given reason. Arguments Inherited from Universal Command Input Description Example Help -h This command give help about the command. &Version -h Permission -p This command give information if you have access to the command. &Version -p Argument Name Description UserId UserId The player that will be banned. Message String The message a player will get when banned. Requirements This command requires you to be a HR or a discord server manager.
docs.title: Ban

docs.text: This command can be used to ban users from the server with a given reason.

docs.text: Purge Info Purges the given amount of messages in the current channel Arguments Inherited from Universal Command Input Description Example Help -h This command give help about the command. &Version -h Permission -p This command give information if you have access to the command. &Version -p Argument Name Description Can be Inputed Number Number The Number of messages that will be gone. ✔ Channel Channel The Channel where the message will be taken ✖ Requirements This command requires you to be a HR or a discord server manager.
docs.title: Purge

docs.text: Purges the given amount of messages in the current channel

docs.text: Remove Info Removes the given messages in the given channel. Btw: This command should never be used anymore since its super complicated. Arguments Inherited from Universal Command Input Description Example Help -h This command give help about the command. &Version -h Permission -p This command give information if you have access to the command. &Version -p Argument Name Description ChannelId Number MessagesId Number Requirements This command requires you to be a HR or a discord server manager.

docs.text: Send Info Sends critical information for humans. (This Document may be missing something at the moment) Arguments Inherited from Universal Command Input Description Example Help -h This command give help about the command. &Version -h Permission -p This command give information if you have access to the command. &Version -p Argument Name Description Help Internal Help Command Display Help. Info Command Info Messages Alert Command Creates an Alert. Manual Command Creates a system message. Argument Folders & Commands Command: Info Argument Name Description Id Number Sends a Info message. (1: Rules, 2: Help Center, 3: Links, 4: reaction roles) Command: Alert Argument Name Description String Endless String The alert's contents. Command: Manual Argument Name Description System String Don't know how to use? Just put system. Type Array String Join or Leave UserId UserId Player UserId to represent the message. Requirements This command requires you to be a HR or a discord server manager.
docs.title: Send

docs.text: Sends critical information for humans. (This Document may be missing something at the moment)
docs.title: Info

docs.text: Inherited from Universal Command Input Description Example Help -h This command give help about the command. &Version -h Permission -p This command give information if you have access to the command. &Version -p Argument Name Description Help Internal Help Command Display Help. Info Command Info Messages Alert Command Creates an Alert. Manual Command Creates a system message.
docs.title: Arguments

docs.text: Command: Info Argument Name Description Id Number Sends a Info message. (1: Rules, 2: Help Center, 3: Links, 4: reaction roles) Command: Alert Argument Name Description String Endless String The alert's contents. Command: Manual Argument Name Description System String Don't know how to use? Just put system. Type Array String Join or Leave UserId UserId Player UserId to represent the message.

docs.text: Tag Info Creates Tag for you to have fun with. This command does not have arguments since everything is built in with tags them selfs. Just do &tag anything . Arguments Inherited from Universal Command Input Description Example Help -h This command give help about the command. &Version -h Permission -p This command give information if you have access to the command. &Version -p

docs.text: Data Types Name Description UserId A User's Id, can be gotten from developer mode. String A string with no spaces. Number A number, always positive. Channel A channel's Id can be gotten from developer mode. Command A command inside of a command, magic. Internal Help Command A command that shows more help. Endless String A string that can have spaces. Array A array of allowed options.
docs.title: Data Types

docs.text: Name Description UserId A User's Id, can be gotten from developer mode. String A string with no spaces. Number A number, always positive. Channel A channel's Id can be gotten from developer mode. Command A command inside of a command, magic. Internal Help Command A command that shows more help. Endless String A string that can have spaces. Array A array of allowed options.
docs.title: Data Types
